verbs.description: on [ARG1: case] [V: waiting] [ARG2: for reunion with niece] [ARGM-TMP: for seven years] ghislaine finck waited in belgium with no word about what happened to her older sister during that time finck did however receive updates on her young niece ghislaine finck baton rouge louisiana sylviane finck lozada angelina baton rouge
